---

Belladonna cultivated in planes hazardous to living visitors, such as the [Shadow Plane](/Planes.aspx?ID=11) or the [Boneyard](/Planes.aspx?ID=15), grow with a strange, skeletal look to their branches. The leaves and berries of these extraplanar plants are partly incorporeal and significantly more toxic than [belladonna](/Equipment.aspx?ID=105) grown on the [Material Plane](/Planes.aspx?ID=1). When imbued with spirit-twisting magic, _spectral nightshade_ quickly drains away the victim's vitality and makes colors painfully bright and bewildering. _Spectral nightshade_ doesn't affect creatures that have no spirit; if a possessing spirit inhabits a body that takes poison damage from spectral nightshade, the possessor takes an equal amount of force damage, even if the possessor can't be affected directly by poisons.

 **Saving Throw** DC 33 Fortitude; **Onset** 1 minute; **Maximum Duration** 6 minutes; **Stage 1** 10d6 poison damage and [dazzled](/Conditions.aspx?ID=7) (1 minute); **Stage 2** 13d6 poison damage and [drained 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=10) (1 minute); **Stage 3** 15d6 poison damage, [confused](/Conditions.aspx?ID=5), and drained 2 (1 minute)

**Craft Requirements** Supply one casting of [_spirit blast_](/Spells.aspx?ID=301).

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
